product_overview: Okey 101 Kural Rehberi is an offline Android application that provides comprehensive rules, strategies, and FAQs for the Okey game with a modern Material Design 3 user interface optimized for performance and usability.
core_goals: Provide complete and detailed Okey game rules categorized for easy navigation.
Enable fast and accurate keyword-based search functionality.
Support offline usage without requiring internet connectivity.
Deliver a modern, user-friendly interface following Material Design 3 guidelines.
Offer personalized user experience including theme selection and font size adjustment.
Include additional game-related content such as strategy guides and FAQs.
Track and present user statistics related to game performance.
Implement efficient data management and smooth navigation with MVVM architecture and dependency injection.
key_features: Home screen displaying categories with search functionality.
Detailed rule explanation page for selected rules.
Category detail pages listing rules by category.
Instant search results for rules by keywords.
FAQ section with commonly asked questions and answers.
Strategy guide section offering tips and tactics for Okey players.
General information section about the Okey game.
Settings menu allowing customization like theme and font size.
Favorites feature to mark frequently used rules.
Offline data storage using Room database with repository pattern.
Modern UI built with Material Design 3 and ViewBinding.
Dark mode support synchronized with system theme.
Efficient asynchronous operations with Kotlin Coroutines and LiveData.
Dependency injection implemented via Hilt for modular development.
Statistical tracking of user gameplay performance.
user_flow_summary: User launches the app and lands on the Home screen showing categories and search box.
User can browse categories to view listed rules under each category.
Selecting a rule navigates to the Rule Detail page with full explanation.
User can perform keyword searches to quickly find relevant rules.
From search results, user selects items to read detailed descriptions.
User accesses the Strategy guide or FAQ sections from main menu to learn tips or get answers.
Settings menu allows user to customize theme, font size, and notifications.
Users can mark rules as favorites for quick future access.
All content and app operation is fully functional offline after initial setup.
Navigation between fragments is managed smoothly through the Navigation Component.
validation_criteria: Application demonstrates offline functionality with no internet dependency.
Search feature returns accurate and relevant results instantly.
UI conforms to Material Design 3 standards and supports dark mode.
All main features including categories, rule details, FAQ, strategy, and settings are accessible and functional.
Performance benchmarks meet responsiveness expectations with smooth navigation and loading.
Data integrity is verified in Room database implementations.
User preferences for theme and font size persist across sessions.
Statistics tracking accurately records user gameplay data.
Dependency injection setup via Hilt is correctly configured for all modules.
Comprehensive unit and integration tests validate ViewModels, Repository, and UI components.
